long_description: Why not be prepared? The MTI Helios Inflatable PFD offers a low-profile fit and on-demand flotation. The MTI Helios inflates instantly with the simple tug of a tab, providing 29 lbs. of floatation should you need it. Uninflated fit is compact and allows an easy range of motion when paddling or fishing. Durable Cordura(R) nylon fabric stands up to heavy use. At-a-glance indicator window lets you know whether PFD is ready to inflate. Includes a back-up oral inlation tube and attached safety whistle. Includes an MTI RK5 CO2 cylinder; additional RK5 CO2 Re-Arming Kits sold separately. Fits chest sizes 30 - 52 in. One size fits adults over 80 lbs.
short_description: Why not be prepared? The MTI Helios Inflatable PFD offers a low-profile fit and on-demand flotation.
